alert.note: Alert for Sanpete; Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 01 at 3:41AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Sanpete and Utah County adjacent to Thistle Creek from the headwaters to near the US-6 junction. * WHEN...Until noon MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Water over roadways including US-89 north of Birdseye. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. River or stream flows are elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 339 AM MDT, local law enforcement reported significant flooding along US-89 near Thistle Creek. US-89 is closed from US-6 at Thistle Junction to Fairview due to this flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Birdseye.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
